name: AlbertAI
0:
”Alexa, ask Albert AI”
”Alexa, open Albert AI”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: albert a. i.
des: Albert AI is a virtual personal assistant. He is completely configurable and will learn and share knowledge about things that are important to you. Simply invoke Albert AI via voice, and your Echo or Dot will respond with the information Albert AI knows about. Albert AI syncs with the Alexa app too, so long or image-based responses, can be displayed right in the app. Albert AI is always growing, utilizing both supervised and unsupervised machine learning, as well as patented natural language processing with an inference engine to provide industry leading artificial intelligence.
